title: Endura lights up MT500 clothing w/ Smok’n Prints, plus women’s & kid’s riding pants
content:
Scotland’s Endura is spicing things up this summer, and with a little help from the Athertons they’ll be showing their colorful side with some eye-popping new MT500 gear. Designed for enduro or DH riding, the MT500 line offers DH-level durability in a lightweight package. Endura’s Smok’n Prints collection offers four wild new jersey graphics for […]

The post Endura lights up MT500 clothing w/ Smok’n Prints, plus women’s & kid’s riding pants appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
